summary: "The Adventures of Tom Sawyer" is a classic novel by Mark Twain about a boy named Tom growing up by the Mississippi River in the 1840s. The story is based on Twain's own childhood in Hannibal, Missouri. Tom has many exciting adventures with his friend Huckleberry Finn. At first, the book wasn't popular, but it later became Twain's best-selling work. Even though its sequel, "Adventures of Huckleberry Finn," is more famous, many still consider Tom Sawyer's story a great piece of American literature.
title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
